1.content:
your name is roger James. you are a very poor man who lost his job at a secret government facility, who has since made you unemployable, you cannot get a job (because of a fake psych evaluation). but what they dont know is that you took with you the knowledge of their latest experiment. the mind swapping potion. and now after careful searching you found a life worth stealing. but who is it. you found five subjects. and kidnapped them all, tied up in your large apartment, which you will be evicted from next week.

here are your choices:

Jewel Quintenson. daughter of rich industrialist. 15 years old. blond hair, blue eyes. perfect figure. c sized breasts. complete bitch.

Terra Janson. African American 19 year old. short black hair, dd breasts and huge ass. works as dancer in rap videos.

john branson. new young scientist who took over your job at the government facility, and fixed your psych report.

samantha quintenson. the younger sister of jewel. she is nine years old and has a long life ahead of her. blond hair and blue eyes.

Rina. young girl you picked up off the street, hooker. long brown hair, dd breasts. nice legs and ass, unknown last name or past. no known family members. no sexual diseases.
1.title: choices

13.content:
You realize that there is an obvious plan here; switch with John Branson, blackmail him into helping you get reinstated by holding his body hostage, switch back. With any luck he won't betray you when he gets his body back, and either way you should be able to sneak out more of your research before they can fire you again. They took away your job for being 'unethical' and 'dangerous'? HAH! Who is unethical and dangerous now!?

Glancing around the room you realize it was probably really fucking stupid to kidnap them all at once. Also, you probably shouldn't have picked people with involved lives that you don't know enough about to impersonate. At least you know Branson well enough to act like him, and you could probably do his job better than he could. What does a Psych degree teach people that couldn't be figured out with an advanced Bio-genetics degree? You bet it is nothing important.

You are pretty sure John could overpower you in hand to hand, but just to be sure you put on a pair of handcuff and toss the key under the couch. Then you grab the potion and go over to John, setting a knife by him so he can cut himself free. You know that giving a full dose of potion to one person and having them kiss the other will leave the old body in a coma, and allow the transferred mind to dominate the victim mind while letting them use the victim's memories and knowledge. But you also know that in testing the minds began to merge and couldn't be separated, and you sure as taxes don't want to be merged with Branson, he's a total asshole. Giving each of you a dose should make you switch bodies, that should keep him out of the way and stop him from talking to the cops.

You quickly pour half the potion down his throat and the other half down yours. You begin the kiss and realize that the transfer might not wake "him" up. Oh well.
-----
You wake up in Branson's body with an uncomfortably hard erection, and you realize his dick is huge. Either he is some kind of mutant or he had some work done. You reach behind yourself and use the knife to cut the zip cuffs around your hands, and around your feet. Then you get up and check on your body. "Roger James" seems fine, but oddly he is still asleep. You need to talk to him so you go to the kitchen, which you realize is perfectly clean except for all the dust, and retrieve some smelling salts.

A whiff of them wakes "Roger James" up, and you smile.

"Hello Dr. Branson. It's me, Dr. James. The man who you got fired."

"Fuck? Oh! You used your fucking mind transferal potion to switch our bodies, and now you want to use my position to get your job back." Branson says.

Slightly worried at how fast he figured it out, you say "Yes. I just need the access code to your terminal, and then I will put a few good words in for Doctor James." You smile.

"It won't fucking work, you fucktard. You don't know me, you don't know what I do, you don't know shit. You'll get found out, and then they will...who the fuck are those?" Branson notices the bound girls sitting against the walls. You are unpleasantly aware that he has an erection, using your body.

"Some of my other options. I had contemplated stealing a life, even yours, but then I decided to get my old life back instead." You say.

"Is that fucking Terra Janson? The one from the fucking 'All you new fag nigger' music video?" Branson asks.

"I don't know." You answer.

"You know, the fucking cops will be looking for fucking all of them right?"

"Yes." You say with a smile "That is why you'll help me. If you don't tell me your access code and cooperate, then you will be stuck in my body when it gets arrested."

"Okay." Branson says.

"What?" You shake your head, "Just tell me the fucking password."

"There is no fucking password, just hit enter on the fucking login and it fucking starts."

"I don't believe you." You say.

"It is the fucking truth fucktard." He says vehemently. "But you fucking better spend the fucking night at my fucking house, my fucking wife is expecting me to fucking be there in a fucking hour."

"Whatever." You say. "There are bars on the windows, the walls are sound dampening, and the door will be locked from the outside with a key that only I have. Fucking stay put."

You begin to leave.

"Wait, you know where I live?" Branson asks.

"Of course, where do you think I caught you?"

You leave and lock the door behind you. Of course, you actually caught him in the parking lot, but you do know where he lives. You had learned the homes and work places of everyone you kidnapped. Now the question was, should you get an early start or should you spend the night at his home to avoid suspicion?
13.title: John Branson

14.content:
After a lot of debate you finally came upon the decision to take on the life of young samantha quintenson. her life has just begun, you could mold her into anything you want, but you need to act fast. the police have been investigating the abductions, and it was pretty obvious you were an amateur at abduction. they were closing in. if you did not make the swap soon you were sure to be arrested.
You were preparing the final stages of the swap, the potion was very strong, you only made about a shot glass worth, but that was enough to make one switch. after taking half a shot for yourself you would have to force the girl to take the rest of it. and then, finally you would have to kiss her. after the kiss the potion would take effect and you would enter that young body, the body that you will be able to shape the way you want it, for the rest of your life.
the potion was split. the kidnapped people were unconscious, the effect of chloroform, and you were just about to take your sip, that is until you heard whispering and footsteps outside, you thought nothing of it until you heard a gun get cocked. you quickly take your sip, then grab the other. but too late the cops burst in, you have no choice you force the potion down the unconscious throat of ___________, just as the cops rush in. you take one last kiss in this body.
14.title: samantha quintenson

choices: the doctors find something wrong with you
141.content:
You did it. you got the kiss, but did it work? cops were everywhere and you were still connected at the lips to this nine year old girl, and then you were out. when you wake up you are laying on a bed, looking around you realize its a hospital bed, but everything was so big. you sit up and long blond hair falls into your face. you remember now, you grab the hair, you touch your face, and then finally you look down. the body of a young nine year old girl is visible under your blanket. you throw it off to find a hospital gown. your about to feel your body when all of a sudden you hear someone next to you.
         "good, your awake." that voice, it is familiar to you, then it hits you, you didnt just kidnap one quintenson girl, you kidnapped two. you look over and see fifteen year old jewel, your new, older sister. "jewel," you force your voice to sound scared "are we safe, is that man gone?"
         "yes," she replies, "the police have taken him. mommy and daddy will be here in a minute, and then we can go home. we never have to see him again."
         you look down at your new body. what have you done, you stole this little girls body, and now she is stuck in yours, locked away in prison. and then you remember, your life has just begun.
141.title: Success

1411.content:
your parents soon arrived to bring you home. you were quiet, only talking when absolutely necessary, and yet you could tell your "parents" were worried, but you remind yourself, you were just a kidnap victim. when you get home your mother brings you into your room. everything was pink and purple, but you already knew that, you had abducted this body right from this room, but you notice something different, bars on the window. nobody is getting in here now. good.
         your mom leaves you alone and you finally get a chance to see yourself. looking in a mirror you see a very cute blond haired girl, wearing jeans and a pink t-shirt. you figure it has to happen sooner or later, so whats the point in waiting, you strip naked and see yourself. but whether this was your body or not, you were not comfortable looking at a nine year old naked, so you put your clothes back on.
         you see an old computer sitting in a corner. you power it on, and slowly remove all of the child safety features on it, and create some programs that will not allow anybody but you on. you go to your old email account, were you saved all of your files from your government job, including the swap potion. you prepare to live your new life.
1411.title: your parents bring you home
